sub_topic: Calculating the volume of a rectangular pyramid.
message_1: A rectangular pyramid has a length of 8 cm, width of 6 cm and a height of 10 cm. Determine the volume of the rectangular pyramid.
message_2:
To find the volume of a rectangular pyramid, we can use the formula:

Volume = (1/3) * Length * Width * Height

Given the dimensions of the pyramid are:
Length = 8 cm
Width = 6 cm
Height = 10 cm

We can plug these values into the formula:

Volume = (1/3) * 8 * 6 * 10

Volume = (1/3) * 480

Volume = 160 cubic centimeters

So, the volume of the rectangular pyramid is 160 cmÂ³.
